import React from "react"; import Navbar from "./Navbar"; import FileBase from "react-file-base64"; import "./dashboard.css"; import { fetchPortfolio, updatePortfolioPost } from "../../Api/index"; import { useState, useEffect } from "react"; const PortfolioAdmin = () => { const [portfolioData, setPortfolioData] = useState({ portfolioId: 1234, title1: "", title2: "", title3: "", title4: "", title5: "", title6: "", title7: "", title8: "", img1: "", img2: "", img3: "", img4: "", img5: "", img6: "", img7: "", img8: "", }); const onload = async () => { const { data } = await fetchPortfolio(); console.log(data, "Details "); const { detailsId, title1, title2, title3, title4, title5, title6, title7, title8, img1, img2, img3, img4, img5, img6, img7, img8, } = data[0]; setPortfolioData({ portfolioId: detailsId, title1: title1, title2: title2, title3: title3, title4: title4, title5: title5, title6: title6, title7: title7, title8: title8, img1: img1, img2: img2, img3: img3, img4: img4, img5: img5, img6: img6, img7: img7, img8: img8, }); }; useEffect(() => { onload(); }, []); return (
